text: If you're desperate to turn back the years on your face but don't have the money or pain threshold to go under the knife, a new beauty trend may be your secret weapon. The'no arch brow'- literally a straight, thick brow with zero arch in it - is being touted as the cheapest and most effective way to knock years off your face. Whilst seriously arched brows have long been the most fashionable style thanks to their ability to open the eyes up, experts believe that they actually draw attention to your fine lines.
